Should expand basic sets with a leading string but no trailing string.
.
ff{c,b,a}
.
ffc
ffb
ffa
.
Should expand basic sets with both leading and trailing strings.
.
f{d,e,f}g
.
fdg
feg
ffg
.
Should expand basic sets with a trailing string but no leading string. 
.
{l,n,m}xyz
.
lxyz
nxyz
mxyz
.
Should honor escaping inside braces
.
{abc\,def}
.
{abc,def}
.
Should honor escaping before a brace
.
\{a,b,c,d,e}
.
{a,b,c,d,e}
.
Should...
.
{x,y,{abc},trie}
.
x,y
{abc}
trie
.
Should...
.
/usr/{ucb/{ex,edit},lib/{ex,how_ex}}
.
/usr/ucb/ex
/usr/ucb/edit
/usr/lib/ex
/usr/lib/how_ex
.
Should...
.
{ }
.
{
}
.
Should...
.
foo {1,2} bar
.
foo
1
2
bar
.
Should...
.
`zecho foo {1,2} bar`
.
foo
1
2
bar
.
Should...
.
$(zecho foo {1,2} bar)
.
foo
1
2
bar
.
Should...
.
foo{bar,${var}.}
.
foobar
foobaz.
.
Should...
.
foo{bar,${var}}
.
foobar
foobaz
.
Should...
.
"${var}"{x,y}
.
bazx
bazy
.
Should...
.
$var{x,y}
.
vx
vy
.
Should...
.
${var}{x,y}
.
bazx
bazy
.
Should...
.

.

.
